success: inline-flex justify-center py-2 px-4 border border-transparent shadow-sm text-sm font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-green-400 hover:bg-green-500 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-green-500
warning: inline-flex justify-center py-2 px-4 border border-transparent shadow-sm text-sm font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-red-400 hover:bg-red-500 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-red-500
cancel: inline-flex justify-center py-2 px-4 border border-transparent shadow-sm text-sm font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-red-400 hover:bg-red-500 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-red-500
